column4: Units of discharge (e.g. m-3 s-1, L s-1, cfs)
column6: Units of water level (e.g. m) at pressure transducer sensor
column7: Average (or effective) depth value for rating curve
column9: Method by which average depth was esimated (e.g. salt slug, cross-sections, etc)
column10: Distance (in meters) upstream of dissolved oxygen sensor over which reach length was estimated
